title: Lol was in champ select and couldnt select any champions which forced me to dodge and lose lp

replies.body: You may have had a bad install that can't load up game files on the updated client.  A [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)should fix this up, as I'm unsure if returning to the legacy client can resolve it if the same files are being used.  Hope it helps!

I also have had this issue for a while now on the Beta client. No issue in alpha. I have not tried to reinstall yet, but I will say that I have had 0 problems such as this - or in general - while using the legacy client. Until I find an opportunity to reinstall, the legacy client appears to be a perfect secondary option.
Of course you dont get any lp back when the problem is caused by Riot. Why should he?
